taskDescription:
Machine translation may be a shortcut to languages you do not know (yet). Try it out for unknown languages!

Try to read the article below and see if you can guess the answer of the following question. You can also try machine translation to help you if the article is not translated (yet) into your language!

QUESTION: How old was the interviewee when she started learning Spanish?

ARTICLE: Intervjuo kun Aleksandra Lun, pola denaskulino, kiu fariĝis fama hispanlingva verkistino
